name: Abstract Dream
description:
Abstract Dream is a 3D isometric platformer, where you play as a young dancer trying to wake up from a weird dream, You have to reach the end of each lvl in order to wake up. In the meantime you can try to gather all coins on each level... Beacause why not ?

You can avoid enemies or kill them by jumping on them. 

Be Careful with the perspective, some platforms may not be as close as you think and other might be a lot closer.

You can control your character with "ZQSD", and jump with "Space bar",   use "Esc" to pause the game.
